game.name: Halloween Where Is My Zombie
game.description:
Playing golf and enjoying Halloween are the two most important things that you love doing when you have some free time. In this brand new arcade game, we have got you covered with a challenge where you can enjoy both the activities at a same place. Would you like to explore it right away? Join Halloween Where Is My Zombie and be prepared to direct the Halloween ball into the hole! It looks simple to play, but difficult to master.

Use the pencil to draw a line or any figure that could help your Halloween ball manage to fall directly into the hole! Do not forget to grab all the coins as you see on the screen to complete each puzzle with the maximum possible stars. The collection of a good number of coins will also help you to unlock new Halloween balls. Common friends! It is time to show your brain power and logical skills to guide your ball through 40 unique and challenging levels.

We are pretty sure that you will have the ability to take the Halloween ball to the hole every time when you try. Check out more addictive and engaging Halloween games on atmegame.com and have a great quality fun time without download! You can invite your friends and family members or also play against the players from across the world here on our website for free. Our website keeps updating regularly so you can expect to find new arcade games to enjoy an awesome gaming experience.
